resources.string: Could not connect to route server. Please try again later.
Could not connect to Google\'s server. Please try again later.
Please enable location services to avoid entering your source.
ETA is not available as there is no information on the third and subsequent buses.
You are within walking distance to your destination.
Reattempting to connect to server again.
Transfer from %1$s to %2$s at %3$s\nArriving in %4$s mins (%5$s)
Transfer from %1$s to %2$s here.\nArriving in %3$s mins (%4$s)
Tap back again to exit the NavUS
NavUS is running in the background.
%1$s has been added to your favourites.
%1$s has been removed from your favourites.
Tap here to enter your source and destination
Tap here to enter your source. If you enabled location services, it will be populated with YOUR LOCATION.
Tap here to enter your destination. Tap on the star icon to add the location to your favourites. A clock icon indicates your recent searches.
Tap on the arrow buttons to view available routes.
Tap here to select your route.
This green bus icon indicates your source.
This blue bus icon indicates a transit stop.
This red bus icon indicates your destination bus stop.
This red icon indicates your destination.
This white icon indicates the bus stops along your route.
Tap on this icon on the map to view bus arrival timings.
Tap on the arrow buttons to view your route instructions. Press the back button to return to the route selection screen.
Tap here to switch the map to satellite view.
Bonus Tip: Leave NavUS running in the background to receive notifications on your route instructions.
Look\'s like there\'s currently no route found. We\'ll resume this tutorial the next time there\'s a route found.
Please wait as we are still computing your route.
